Christian humiliation, or, A treatise of fasting declaring the nature, kindes, ends, vses, and properties of a religious fast: together with a briefe discourse concerning the fast of Lent. By Henry Mason, pastor of Saint Andrews-Vndershaft London. Mason, Henry, 1573?-1647.
[6], 163, [1] p.
Printed by G[eorge] P[urslowe] for Iohn Clarke, and are to be sold at his shop vnder S. Peters Church in Corne-hill, London : 1625.
Printer's name from STC. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
